title: Fire Rabbit
author: Fire Rabbit
content: I want to buy filmora software and bandicam software. Its one time payment. I have money in crypto but right now I cant convert it into fiat.Can anyone help me to buy those softwares in fiat? I can pay in crypto with 25 dollars extra. Dealing with trusted members only and I can pay first. You can create a login id and password and do the payment with fiat and can erase all card or paypal details and hand over the account details to me. After that I will change the password of the account. If anyone is willing to help me , please message me.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: You have money in crypto but don't want to convert it to cash, but you are still going spend the same crypto to pay who ever decides to help you,  why don't you just save yourself the stress and convert your crypto to fiat and pay for whatever you want to buy online?And by the way.... I will suggest you mention the cost of those items, so that any prospective helper will beforehand know how much is to be spent and see if they can afford it ~ rather than them having to pm you first to know.And secondly,  also state categorically which coin you are going to be paying in, are you going to be paying in Bitcoin? I guess so since this service board is reserved for only Bitcoin paying services ~but still make it categorically clear.The above suggestions, I believe will help you find people that are will to help faster ~ this is if what you are asking for is possible anyway.
